response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I understand the importance of this investment to you and I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations.

To make this acquisition even more appealing, I am offering you a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This represents a significant saving of $50,000 compared to the standard price, making it an exceptional deal for someone as discerning as yourself.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and guide you through the process of acquiring this remarkable product.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
